All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AddDeadlineCommand
    Command that adds deadline
    AddEventCommand
    Command that adds event
    AddTodoCommand
    Command that adds todo
    Command
    Command that adds todo
    CommandResult
    Represents the result of a command execution.
    Deadline
    The Deadline class that represents a deadline task.
    DeleteCommand
    Deletes a task identified using it's last displayed index from the task list.
    DialogBox
    This control represents a dialog box consisting of an ImageView to represent the speaker's face and a label containing text from the speaker.
    Duke
    Duke class represents the bot which contains a tasklist and interacts with the tasks.
    DukeDecoder
    DukeDencoder decodes all the Task in the toSave into a list of decodable
    DukeEncoder
    DukeEncoder encodes all the Task in the toSave into a list of decodable
    DukeException
    Duke exception is customised exception class for Bot
    Event
    The Event class that represents a event task.
    ExitCommand
    Exits the program
    FindCommand
    Represents an find command.
    HelpCommand
    Help function that helps the user to clarify doubts
    IllegalValueException
    Signals that some given data does not fulfill some constraints.
    IncorrectCommand
    Represents an incorrect command.
    Launcher
    A launcher class to workaround classpath issues.
    ListCommand
    Represents an list command.
    Main
    A GUI for Duke using FXML.
    MainWindow
    Controller for MainWindow.
    MarkDoneCommand
    Marks a task as done in the task list.
    Messages
    Container for user visible messages.
    Parser
    Parses user input.
    Parser.ParseException
    Signals that the user input could not be parsed.
    StorageFile
    StorageFile manages the storage of the Best2103Bot
    StorageFile.InvalidStorageFilePathException
    Signals that the given file path does not fulfill the storage filepath constraints.
    StorageFile.StorageOperationException
    Signals that some error has occured while trying to convert and read/write data between the application and the storage file.
    Task
    The task class that represents a task.
    TaskList
    A list of tasks that does not allow null elements or duplicates.
    TaskList.TaskNotFoundException
    Signals that an operation targeting a specified task in the list would fail because there is no such matching task in the list.
    Todo
    The Todo class that represents a Todo task.
